pullRequest.title: Post event performance update
pullRequest.bodyText:
Hey @luciano-fiandesio,
this is the initial draft PR fhe tracker update.

commit.message: wip: resolved all data for event insert
wip: add cache for program hierarchy, fixed issue in cache for program stages

- made validation rules only act on immutable events
- introduced pre-processor chain to "prepare" data for validation
refator: Extracting validation into checkers (not compiling)
Merge branch 'POST_EVENT_PERFORMANCE' of https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-core into POST_EVENT_PERFORMANCE_UPDATE
refactor: Extracting more checkers from update
Merge branch 'POST_EVENT_PERFORMANCE' of https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-core into POST_EVENT_PERFORMANCE_UPDATE
refactor: Consolidating initial Checkers and raising questions
wip: resolved all data for event insert
wip: add cache for program hierarchy, fixed issue in cache for program stages

- made validation rules only act on immutable events
- introduced pre-processor chain to "prepare" data for validation

Adding skeleton of pre/post processors

Also adding some config lists for events update.

nodes.bodyText:
Answering some of the questions here:
Actually I'm not sure either. For instance, NEW_AND_UPDATE seems to overlap 99% CREATE_AND UPDATE.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -217,4 +224,37 @@ public RetryTemplate retryTemplate()
             ImportStrategy.CREATE_AND_UPDATE, CREATE_EVENTS_PREPROCESS,
             ImportStrategy.NEW_AND_UPDATES, CREATE_EVENTS_PREPROCESS );
     }
+
+    /**
+     * Default validation chains for Tracker Import (update) events process.
+     */
+    private final static List<Class<? extends org.hisp.dhis.dxf2.events.event.validation.ValidationCheck>> UPDATE_EVENTS_CHECKS = Lists
+        .newArrayList(
+        // @formatter:off
+            EventBasicCheck.class,
+            ProgramStageInstanceBasicCheck.class,
+            ProgramStageInstanceAclCheck.class,
+            ProgramCheck.class,
+            EventBaseCheck.class,
+            ProgramStageInstanceAuthCheck.class,
+            AttributeOptionComboCheck.class,
+            EventGeometryCheck.class
+        );
+        // @formatter:on
+
+    // TODO: Ask what's the difference between the values in the Enum ImportStrategy?

nodes.bodyText: I have created some shared super-class code to get this kind of data, we can refactor later
We can calculate completedBy only when is needed (if status == completed)
Yes exactly, I have created a shared function for this and a new Validator for the username lenght (note that this is a warning, rather than a breaking error)

commit.message: fix: Extract completedBy only for COMPLETED status
